content: पत्रं [पत्-ष्ट्रन्] {@--1@} A leaf (of a tree); धत्ते भरं कुसुमपत्रफलावलीनां <ls>Bv. 1. 94.</ls> {@--2@} The leaf of a flower, lotus &c.; नीलोत्पलपत्रधारया <ls>Ś. 1. 18.</ls> {@--3@} A leaf for writing upon, a paper, a leaf written upon; पत्रमारोप्य दीयतां <ls>Ś. 6</ls> ‘commit to writing;’ <ls>V. 2. 14.</ls> {@--4@} A letter, document; <ls>Pt. 1. 403.</ls> {@--5@} Any thin leaf or plate of metal, a gold-leaf. {@--6@} The wing of a bird, a pinion, feather of an arrow; <ls>R. 2. 31</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 27.</ls> {@--7@} A vehicle in general (car, horse, camel &c.); दिशः पपात पत्रेण वेगनिष्कंपकेतुना <ls>R. 15. 84</ls>; <ls>N. 3. 16.</ls> {@--8@} Painting the person (particularly the face) with musk, sandal-juice or other fragrant substances; रचय कुचयोः पत्रं चित्रं कुरुष्व कपोलयोः <ls>Gīt. 12</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 55.</ls> {@--9@} The blade of a sword, knife &c. {@--10@} A knife, dagger.
